body_html:
A ResourceExhaustedError is typically raised when a particular tensor could not be allocated on the requested device.
@nadianaji could you add additional details on your GPU? Is the same GPU being used to drive a display? What's the output of nvidia-smi?
body_text:
A ResourceExhaustedError is typically raised when a particular tensor could not be allocated on the requested device.
@nadianaji could you add additional details on your GPU? Is the same GPU being used to drive a display? What's the output of nvidia-smi?
body:
A `ResourceExhaustedError` is typically raised when a particular tensor could not be allocated on the requested device. 
@nadianaji could you add additional details on your GPU? Is the same GPU being used to drive a display? What's the output of `nvidia-smi`?
